cDynamicExpression::Functor

cDynamicExpression::Functor Class Reference

#include <cdynamicexpression.h>

Inheritance diagram for cDynamicExpression::Functor:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Function object base class.

We use function objects to handle NED parameter references, "index" and "sizeof" operators, and references to NED "for" loop variables.
